TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SessionPageStateSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class SessionPageStateSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

Docs.summary: Configures the section. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SessionPageStateSection> refers to the `sessionPageState` section of the configuration file.
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SessionPageStateSection> can read and write information from and to the related section of the configuration file according to the section property <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A> whose value is <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition.Everywhere>.
## Examples The following code example shows how to obtain the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SessionPageStateSection> object from the configuration file associated with an existing Web application.
:::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionPageStateSection/CS/sessionpagestatesection.cs" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionPageStateSection/VB/sessionpagestatesection.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SessionPageStateSection.%23ctor%2A> constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SessionPageStateSection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.

Docs.summary: Defines the size of the page history.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example shows how to obtain the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SessionPageStateSection.DefaultHistorySize> property from the configuration file associated with an existing Web application.
:::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionPageStateSection/CS/sessionpagestatesection.cs" id="Snippet2"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionPageStateSection/VB/sessionpagestatesection.vb" id="Snippet2":::

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the size of the page history.
Docs.value: The size of the page history.
